description: Try our easy to follow Grilled Mango Cheeks recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Cooked fruit,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Halal,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Mango,Peanut free
name: Grilled Mango Cheeks Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.25 cup coconut sugar (plus extra to sprinkle)

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat a barbecue grill or chargrill pan over medium-high heat.
Cut mango cheeks close to the stone. Brush cheeks with oil, sprinkle with sugar and cook mango, cut side down, for 2-3 minutes or until sugar caramelises. Remove and cool. Chargrill lime.
Serve mango cheeks scattered with extra sugar, coconut flakes, charred lime and yoghurt.
